lead_paragraph: An account by a member of a prison gang suggests the target of the assassination was not an employee of the U.S. consulate, but her husband, a prison guard.
snippet: An account by a member of a prison gang suggests the target of the assassination was not an employee of the U.S. consulate, but her husband, a prison guard.

headline.main: Suspect Says Juárez Killers Had Pursued Jail Guard
headline.seo: Suspect in Juárez Says Killers Had Pursued Jail Guard
headline.print_headline: Suspect Says Juárez Killers Had Pursued Jail Guard
